sentences.en: All this enmity and passion had Pearl inherited, by inalienable right, out of Hester's heart.
sentences.cn: 这一切仇恨和热情,都是珠儿理所当然地从海丝特心中承袭下来的.

sentences.en: Britain was accused of trying to partition the country "because of historic enmity"
sentences.cn: 英国被指“出于历史仇恨”企图分裂该国。

sentences.en: He had earned their lasting enmity.
sentences.cn: 他招致他们长期的敌视.

sentences.en: He said it in a spirit of enmity.
sentences.cn: 他是怀着敌意说这话的.

sentences.en: He trotted through the sand, enduring the sun's enmity.
sentences.cn: 他忍着骄阳的炙烤,小步跑过沙滩.

sentences.en: I think there is an historic enmity between them.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他们之间的仇恨由来已久。

sentences.en: She is at enmity with her neighbors.
That lady was at deep enmity with her neighbours.
sentences.cn: 这个妇人与邻居结怨甚深.

sentences.en: The enemy mask their enmity under an appearance of friendliness.
sentences.cn: 敌人用友好的外表来掩饰内心的敌意.

sentences.en: The Franco - Prussian war had sown seeds of enmity which were eventually to bear fruit.
sentences.cn: 普法战争播下仇恨的种子,后来终于结成恶果.

sentences.en: The opprobrium and enmity he incurred were caused by his outspoken brashness.
sentences.cn: 他招致的轻蔑和敌意是由于他出言过于粗率而造成的.

sentences.en: the traditional problem of the enmity between Protestants and Catholics
sentences.cn: 新教徒和天主教徒之间历来仇视的问题

sentences.en: Their friendship was turned to enmity through idle gossip.
sentences.cn: 无聊的闲言碎语使他们反目成仇.

sentences.en: There was enmity between the two persons.
Though Chao Hsin - mei was jealous of Fang Hung - chien , it was not an it's - either - you - or - me type of enmity.
sentences.cn: 赵辛楣 对方鸿 渐 虽有醋意, 并无什么你死我活的仇恨.

trans.tran_cn: 仇恨，敌意，敌视，敌对的状态
trans.tran_en: Enmity is a feeling of hatred toward someone that lasts for a long time
